_header: God that art of mights most / The seven gifts of the Holy Ghost
Subjects: prayers, for gifts of the Holy Ghost; Holy Ghost, gifts of
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Addit. 22283 [Simeon]: not in this MS.
_description: A prayer for the gifts of the Holy Ghost — five 6-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
God þat art of mihtes mostÞe seuen ȝiftus of þe
                    holi gost…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…To þat Ioye þow me sendeÞat lasteþ now
                    and ay. AMEN.

BLAdd37787.First Lines:
Lord þat art of mihtes mostÞe seuen ȝiftes of
                    þe holigost…
BLAdd37787.Last Lines:
…To þat ioye þu me sendeÞat lastes now and ay.
                    Amen
